entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , La Malbaie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
